name: Modular Cabinet Set
subtitle: litter hideaway | pet house
description:
Inspired by the design and function of classic mid 20th century storage credenzas we’ve paired our most popular Standard Cabinet with our Compact II Cabinet to conveniently disguise unsightly litter pans and reduce litter tracking!

Additionally, this set can be used as a place for your modern cat (or dog!) to play, perch or sleep while fitting into your home’s modern décor.

littermat.title: Litter Mat for Compact II Cabinet

details.title: Features
content: Handcrafted with 3/4" Walnut Hardwood veneer Euro Ply
Right-hand side OR left-hand side pet entrance
Holes on either side allow for ventilation and easy moving
Optional removable 1" foam cushion in your choice of fabric

content: Items ship free, fully assembled (Continental US only)
